001package gbw.melange.common.events;
002
003import gbw.melange.common.events.interactions.Button;
004import gbw.melange.common.events.interactions.Key;
005
006public interface OnClick {
007
008    @FunctionalInterface
009    interface MouseHandler {
010        boolean handle(int onScreenX, int onScreenY);
011    }
012
013    @FunctionalInterface
014    interface eventHandler{
015        boolean on();
016    }
017
018    void mouse(Button button, MouseHandler function);
019    void mouseDown(Button button, MouseHandler function);
020    void mouseUp(Button button, MouseHandler function);
021    void mouseMove(MouseHandler function);
022    void key(Key key, Runnable runnable);
023    void keyDown(Key key, Runnable runnable);
024    void keyUp(Key key, Runnable runnable);
025
026    void whileKeyHeld(Key key, Runnable runnable);
027    void whileButtonHeld(Button button, Runnable runnable);
028
029
030}
